climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Single-Edge Razor Blades: Half that of a double-edge blade, Leaf Shave blade pack includes 50 single-edge platinum coated steel blades
Recyclable: Once ready to be replaced, collect used razors blades in Leaf Shave’s Blade Recycling Tin
Cost Effective Refills: Ditch costly cartridges by re-loading with single-edge blades only
Compatibility: Leaf Shave’s single-edge blades are compatible with the Leaf Razor, Twig Razor, Thorn Razor, and Leaf Dermaplaner by Leaf Shave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Sustainable and Superior Shaving Experience
reviews.reviewText: Leaf Shave has gained a reputation for producing high-quality, eco-friendly shaving products, and their Single-Edge Safety Razor Blades are no exception. As someone who has been on the quest for the perfect shaving experience, I was eager to give these blades a try. After using them for some time, I can confidently say that they exceeded my expectations in several key aspects.SustainabilityOne of the standout features of Leaf Shave's Single-Edge Safety Razor Blades is their commitment to sustainability. These blades are made with stainless steel, which is not only long-lasting but also 100% recyclable. What truly sets them apart is that they come in a paper-based packaging that is plastic-free and fully compostable. This eco-conscious approach is a major selling point for me, as I appreciate brands that prioritize the environment.ValueIn terms of value for money, Leaf Shave's Single-Edge Safety Razor Blades are a fantastic investment. While they may seem slightly more expensive than disposable cartridges upfront, their longevity and the reduced need for replacements make them a budget-friendly choice in the long run. Plus, the quality of the shave they provide is hard to beat.Leaf Shave's Single-Edge Safety Razor Blades are an excellent choice for those seeking an eco-friendly, high-quality shaving experience. Their sustainability, sharpness, durability, versatility, and overall value make them a top pick for anyone looking to reduce waste and achieve a superior shave. I highly recommend these blades to anyone who values both a clean-cut look and a cleaner planet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaf customer for about a year.
reviews.reviewText: I got a Leaf Twig about a year ago and that kit came with one of these. The 50ct razors lasted well over 6 months. I shave roughly 3-4 times a week and am an all over shaver, so each blade gets a pretty good workout before I change it. If you ask google how long a single blade safety razor lasts, it'll tell you 5-6 shaves. For a body shaver that's a lot more real estate than just a face, so I change mine about every 2.5 shaves. I did try Shark blades for a bit, but I had to change those every shave and I was getting nicks and ingrown hairs. Those were the only brand I tried before going right back to these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Leaf for a year now and can honestly say I love it. The glide and comfort of the blades are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great replacements and a bit less expensive on Amazon if you have prime
reviews.reviewText: I like my Leaf razor, and was happy to find these replacement blades on amazon, since I could save on shipping. I do wish they were a little bit thicker because I feel I need to replace them more often than I would a standard razor. I still think it is better than disposable since the metal can be easily recycled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved my leaf razor when I used it, though the black one does chip too silver. The razors though, I don't recall receiving though because they're such a small item I may have lost immediately or missed in if it came in a pkg with something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Sharp And sturdy as well. Sturdiness important to me because my dexterity is not the best so I find these blades easy to handle installing and removing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very sharp!
reviews.reviewText: I was able to use it for 2 of my tools for shaving. It was sharp enough to cut but not to injure myself. It was a lot of blades and again its good quality , i don't have to change right away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaf all others
reviews.reviewText: I switched over to my leaf a year ago and just finally bought refills! I love this razor worth ever penny!
